headline: The RealReal, Carnival, PacBio, Quest Resource, and Hudson Technologies Shares Are Soaring, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after the major indices rebounded (Nasdaq +1.5%, S&P 500 +1.0%) as reports pointed to easing tensions between Israel and Iran.

headline: Q1 Earnings Roundup: Carnival (NYSE:CCL) And The Rest Of The Travel and Vacation Providers Segment
